articles.title: Saturn regains status as planet with most moons in solar system - The Guardian
articles.description: Discovery of 62 new moons restores ringed planet’s lead after it was briefly overtaken by Jupiter
articles.content:
Saturn has regained its crown as the planet with the most moons in the solar system, just months after being overtaken by its fellow gas giant Jupiter.
